name: Columbia Masters Swim Team (COLM) â€” Team Records
description: Top times and team records for COLM, a US Masters Swimming club in Columbia, SC. Each record represents the fastest time by a COLM swimmer in a given event, course, gender, and age group.

datasets.name: All Team Records
datasets.description: All COLM top times across every course, event, gender, and age group.

schema.course: Pool course: scy (Short Course Yards), scm (Short Course Meters), or lcm (Long Course Meters)
schema.timeInSeconds: Numeric time in seconds for sorting/comparison
schema.date: Date of the swim (ISO string or null)
schema.meet: Name of the meet where the time was recorded

source: US Masters Swimming (usms.org) top times database
